text:
Dear all:
  When I used jk_mod to connect Tomcat5 and Apache2,it logged that as the following:

[Sat May 08 12:15:40 2010] [3412:3312] [debug] jk_ajp_common.c (2512): worker tomcat1 contact is '2001:da8:207:5338:224:1dff:fe86:46da:7009'
[Sat May 08 12:15:40 2010] [3412:3312] [error] jk_ajp_common.c (2526): worker tomcat1 can't resolve tomcat address 2001:da8:207:5338:224:1dff:fe86:46da


  I saw this ploblem in bug:43968, and i tied to change the source(1.2.27v) but i found that the original code and the the source(1.2.27v) are not equal.Such as jk_connect.c:jk_open_socket.
  Thanks.
creator: hysunny2008@gmail.com

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 43968 ***
creator: rainer.jung@kippdata.de
